lines.text: Beautiful up here, isn't it? Those trees. I've always liked that poem that said, "Only God can make a tree."
Yeah, but on the other hand, you gotta figure, who else would take the time?
What's wrong with a pass now and then? It's good for your morale.
She's so lonely, even though she ought to be used to it by now.
Don't kid yourself. You can get used to being poor, guess even blind. You never get used to being lonely.
Oh, I didn't realize - you've got people in there, haven't you?
